version_description:
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

We update the app regularly. Install the latest version to get the newest features and improvements.
Thank you for using AXIS Companion.

Bug fixes and performance improvements.

We update the app regularly. Install the latest version to get the newest features and improvements.
Thank you for using AXIS Companion.

Users with video motion detection notifications enabled can now see and access motion notifications which have occurred in the past. Pressing an event will open the recordings view and the clip will start to play. The list of events can be found in the new events tab. You can only access the list if you have operator or administrator access.
